name: French verb conjugator with Vatefaireconjuguer
description: French verb conjugator - Conjugate French verbs with ease using this helpful tool.   If youre not sure how a certain French verb (tre, avoir, aller, faire, etc.) should be conjugated, just type it in the search box, hit enter, and the site will show you the conjugation for each tense including subjunctive and imperative forms for each French verb.
